  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: shipment taken out of system flow due to external carton wet and leaking package found one trailer # 823619 already damaged wet and leaking upon inspection 4 x 1 gallon plastic bottles of acid cleaner # 5 1 x 1 gallon plastic bottle of acid cleaner had a loose cap allowing 0.10 gallon to release from container Facility procedures for damaged hazardous materials followed contents contained and awaiting disposition.

item.title: Report X-2024051824
item.description:
Report X-2024051824

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-13T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: LEWISBERRY
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment taken out of system flow due to external carton ripped torn wet and leaking package came off trailer #952908 already damaged ripped torn open wet and leaking upon inspection of contents 4 x 1 gallon plastic bottles of Low Temp San chlorinated sanitizer for low temp dish machines one 1 gallon plastic bottle was bent dented with a loose cap allowing .25 gallons to release package did have slotted partitions but no bags or absorbent was found. facility procedures for damaged hazardous materials followed contents contained and awaiting disposition

item.title: Report E-2024060111
item.description:
Report E-2024060111

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-13T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-10
  • City: YORK
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered a pallet that had pails on it. During the course of transportation the pallet failed because it was not sturdy and as a result one of the broken boards slightly punctured two of the pails. The spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as one the punctured pails.
